name: LD49 - Dimensional Shift
description:
Dimensional Shift is a game where you have the power to switch to another dimension. Be careful though ! As this dimension is very unstable. You can switch back and forth as much as you like, but be careful, would you stay too long in the alternate dimension, you will be stuck in it and have to find your way out. Some paths will only open during this event, but you will be met with adversity.

UPDATE (during submission hour): fixed a level oversight and fixed a possible softlock

UPDATE 2 : 

- Fixed the tombstone sometimes being misplaced

- Slightly moved a key/portal in level 2

- Added a couple hints in the tutorial level

- Changed monster riding physics 

- Changed lava visuals to spikes in one area for the sake of consistency
